evidence.claim: Aztec Technologies uses AWS for cloud hosting services.
The company has expertise in HIPAA and FHIR standards for health data.
Integration of EHR systems with HL7 standards is mentioned in their capabilities.
They utilize Azure and GCP for scalable cloud solutions.
Aztec offers solutions for X12 EDI to facilitate healthcare transactions.

icp.icp_reason: Aztec Technologies works with HIPAA X12 transactions and integrates with healthcare systems.
matched_use_cases: API automation for healthcare data exchange
